quote: Fantasy is a necessary ingredient in living, it's a way of looking at life through the wrong end of a telescope, and that enables you to laugh at life's realities.
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: Fantasy is a necessary ingredient in living, it's a way of looking at life through the wrong end of a telescope.
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: Fantasy is hardly an escape from reality. It's a way of understanding it.
author: Lloyd Alexander

quote: I like nonsense, it wakes up the brain cells. Fantasy is a necessary ingredient in living.
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: I like nonsense, it wakes up the brain cells. Fantasy is a necessary ingredient in living, It's a way of looking at life through the wrong end of a telescope. Which is what I do, And that enables you to laugh at life's realities.
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: Everyones greatest fantasy is to walk away from the life (they think)you lead
author: Pete Wentz

quote: Set your fantasies in the here and now and then, if challenged, claim to be writing Magical Realism.
author: Neil Gaiman

quote: Reality depresses me. I need to find fantasy worlds and escape in them.
author: Noel Fielding

quote: A diary with no drawings of me in it? Where are the torrid fantasies? The romance covers?
author: Cassandra Clare,  City of Bones

quote: If you like fantasy and you want to be the next Tolkien, don’t read big Tolkienesque fantasies — Tolkien didn’t read big Tolkienesque fantasies, he read books on Finnish philology. Go and read outside of your comfort zone, go and learn stuff.
author: Neil Gaiman

quote: For the last 30 years our cinemas have been ruled by science fiction and horror. We've had some very good Fantasy films in that time period, but for my tastes I still haven't seen fantasy done to absolute perfection. That is the hope I have in this project.
author: Harry Knowles

quote: Fantasy is escapist, and that is its glory. If a soldier is imprisioned by the enemy, don't we consider it his duty to escape?. . .If we value the freedom of mind and soul, if we're partisans of liberty, then it's our plain duty to escape, and to take as many people with us as we can!
author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quote: Who are you?Are you in touch with all of your darkest fantasies?Have you created a life for yourself where you can experience them?I have. I am fucking crazy.But I am free.
author: Lana Del Rey

quote: Tell me, what is it you plan to do with your one wild and precious life?
author: Mary Oliver

quote: Your fantasies define you, so dream carefully. A man with no imagination is a man with no future in today’s world—and no past in tomorrow’s.
author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

quote: I had a dream about you last night. We watched pornography together, but purely for the storyline.
author: Michael Summers,  I Had a Dream About You

quote: Wild Nights – Wild Nights!Were I with theeWild Nights should beOur luxury!Futile – the winds –To a heart in port –Done with the compass –Done with the chart!Rowing in Eden –Ah, the sea!Might I moor – Tonight –In thee!
author: Emily Dickinson,  Selected Poems

quote: My experience of life is that it is not divided up into genres; it’s a horrifying, romantic, tragic, comical, science-fiction cowboy detective novel. You know, with a bit of pornography if you're lucky.
author: Alan Moore

quote: Would you mind a mind blindfold, a block on your imagination? You couldn’t create a fantasy world to live in, but you could create a life for yourself without irrational fears of the future.
author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

quote: My mind's my kingdom.
author: Francis Quarles

quote: I made a sorry face in response to such strong insistence, but I couldn’t believe him. Fantasies were exactly that..…..fantasies. Whimsy. Wishes. Mere castles in the sky without foundation or substance. Dreams didn’t come true. To believe so would be to believe falsely, to surrender to madness, to give in to an unreliable hope that would crush me once again as it always, always did!
author: Richelle E. Goodrich,  Dandelions: The Disappearance of Annabelle Fancher

quote: Ambition is not what a man would do, but what a man does, for ambition without action is fantasy.
author: Bryant McGill

quote: ***A KEY WORD*** Imagined
author: Markus Zusak,  The Book Thief

quote: This isn't a book. This isn't a paranormal fantasy or whatever the hell it is you read. There is no set plot or clear idea of where any of this is going. The enemies aren't obvious. There are no guaranteed happy endings.
author: Jennifer L. Armentrout,  Opal

quote: If you want to see magic, love someone and see the magical transformation.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Reality provides us with facts so romantic that imagination itself could add nothing to them.
author: Jules Verne

quote: No book can be appreciated until it has been slept with and dreamed over.
author: Eugene Field

quote: Dream by making and make by dreaming.
author: Dejan Stojanovic

quote: Surrealism: An archaic term. Formerly an art movement. No longer distinguishable from everyday life.
author: Brad Holland

quote: Life is magic.
author: A.D. Posey

quote: I had a dream about you last night.. You were balancing ten tiny footballs on your nose while dancing with a turquoise unicorn.
author: Amy Summers,  I Had a Dream About You

quote: Transform into your dream.
author: A.D. Posey

quote: A daily dose of daydreaming heals the heart, soothes the soul, and strengthens the imagination.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich,  Smile Anyway: Quotes, Verse, & Grumblings for Every Day of the Year

quote: It’s strange how dreams get under your skin and give your heart a test for what’s real and what’s imaginary.
author: Jason Mraz

quote: I couldn't tell fact from fiction,Or if the dream was trueMy only sure predictionIn this world was you.I'd touch your features inchly. Beard love and dared the cost, The sented spiel reeled me unreal And I found my senses lost.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: Life is but a momentary glimpse of the wonder of this astonishing universe, and it is sad to see so many dreaming it away on spiritual fantasy.
author: Andy Mulcahy

quote: I had a dream about you last night... Well I say dream I mean nightmare... you were a Yankee fan.
author: Nicole McKay,  I Had a Dream About You

quote: Lusty blacksmiths and naughty princesses. Now that's scary
author: Simon Holt,  The Devouring

quote: Cherish sunsets, wild creatures and wild places. Have a love affair with the wonder and beauty of the earth.
author: Stewart Udall

quote: At night I lay awake, her likeness casting dark shadows across my soul and senses, and my stomach throbbing away. I imagined her arms around me, lulling me into a phantom bliss, so frustrating, so unreal.
author: Stephen Mosley

quote: Chase your dreams until you catch them...and then dream, catch, and dream again!
author: Dee Marie,  Sons of Avalon: Merlin's Prophecy

quote: Books may well be the only true magic.
author: Alice Hoffman

quote: Reach high, for stars lie hidden in you. Dream deep, for every dream precedes the goal.
author: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: To fall in love with someone's thoughts - the most intimate, splendid romance.
author: Sanober Khan

quote: Why do I do anything?' she says. 'I'm educated enough to talk myself out of any plan. To deconstruct any fantasy. Explain away any goal. I'm so smart I can negate any dream.
author: Chuck Palahniuk,  Choke

quote: MagicSandra’s seen a leprechaun,Eddie touched a troll,Laurie danced with witches once,Charlie found some goblins gold.Donald heard a mermaid sing,Susy spied an elf,But all the magic I have knownI've had to make myself.
author: Shel Silverstein,  Where the Sidewalk Ends: The Poems and Drawings of Shel Silverstein

quote: Dreams are the bright creatures of poem and legend, who sport on earth in the night season, and melt away in the first beam of the sun, which lights grim care and stern reality on their daily pilgrimage through the world.
author: Charles Dickens,  Nicholas Nickleby

quote: Through the darkest hours of the nightand through the dreamers realm I seek,Far beyond the starry skyand beyond galaxies I am free.Through the grimmest memoriesand past a seasons air I cannot breathe,Far beyond this mortal worldin an afterlife we shall meet.
author: Lee Argus

quote: The biggest adventure you can take is to live the life of your dreams.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: was it scripted by God or I am playing with my life.
author: Durgesh Satpathy,  Equating the Equations of Insanity: A Journey from Grief to Victory
